remarks: Variable to class conversion of transitive relation.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-1998.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
statement:
vtoclr.1 $e |- Rel R $.
vtoclr.2 $e |- ( ( x R y /\ y R z ) -> x R z ) $.
vtoclr $p |- ( ( A R B /\ B R C ) -> A R C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
